div.div: TEN TRICKS TO BECOME A GMAIL MASTER

div.a: You Don't Know How To Use Gmail

div.div: Even if you use it every day, you're probably not making the most of the features it has to offer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYCfTk&via=Digg&text=You Don't Know How To Use Gmail

div.a: Macy's Parade Confetti Included Confidential Police Docs, Social Security Numbers

div.div: Confidential personal information is what some paradegoers found among confetti tossed during the world's most famous parade. That information included social security numbers and banking information for police employees, some of whom are undercover officers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qg5K61&via=Digg&text=Macy's Parade Confetti Included Confidential Police Docs, Social Security Numbers

div.a: The Unbelievable Lightness Of Some African States

div.div: What is striking and surprising is just how easy it can be to take over some African states, or large parts of them. The post-independence historical record provides numerous examples where dozens or a few hundred armed men have done it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UPGHDz&via=Digg&text=The Unbelievable Lightness Of Some African States

div.div: Launched Monday, @RobDelanie cleverly spoofs Delaney as the obnoxiously low-brow comedian that he’s devolved into, wonderfully mocking all of Delaney’s tired diatribes and stupid tweets directed at public figures.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UXg5ko&via=Digg&text=Is @RobDelanie Funnier Than @RobDelaney?

div.div: WELL, IF NOT 'HAPPY,' THEN AT LEAST 'JOLLY'
As Americans carefully avoid counting the calories they consumed over Thanksgiving, a new Gallup poll has found that as our waistlines increase, so does our perceptions of our ideal weight.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WIJTXO&via=Digg&text=Most Americans Are Happily Overweight

div.div: I love feedback loops. Servo motors, thermostats, op-amps, DC-DC converters, social networks, flocking behavior. Our bodies. Massages, cuddling, sex– these are all ways of bringing a partner into your body’s most fun closed-loop systems.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4j0c2&via=Digg&text=Hacking My Vagina

div.a: A Brief History Of Restaurants Run By Rappers

div.div: Given rap's obsession with food, it's not surprising that many hop-hop stars with some money in their pockets have decided to get into the restaurant game.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tgr34O&via=Digg&text=A Brief History Of Restaurants Run By Rappers

div.div: The association of judges here called Saturday for courts across Egypt to suspend all but their most vital activities to protest an edict by President Mohamed Morsi granting himself unchecked power by setting his decrees above judicial review until the ratification of a new constitution.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tclp3r&via=Digg&text=Egyptian Judges, Demonstrators Fight Back

div.div: A stark personal tale of how videogame fantasy can inspire interest, provoke thought, and ultimately change how we see the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qf3sUI&via=Digg&text=Gaming, Gay Marriage, And Me

div.div: Thursday was Thanksgiving. Yesterday was Black Friday. And today is Gangnam Style Day — the world’s most popular-but-not-sure-why video became the most popular video on YouTube, ever, with some 804 million views.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R87oYH&via=Digg&text=YouTube's Most Popular Video Ever

div.a: Here's What The Hobbit-Themed Air New Zealand Aircraft Looks Like

div.div: To say that Air New Zealand is clearly milking it is an understatement. And why not?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qfy34p&via=Digg&text=Here's What The Hobbit-Themed Air New Zealand Aircraft Looks Like

div.div: GET IT? BECAUSE 'SCREWED' ALSO MEANS SEX

div.a: How Over-the-Counter Birth Control Could Screw You

div.div: The nation’s top OB/GYNs have come out for allowing access to the pill without a prescription. Sounds good for the consumer, right? Not so fast, writes Dr. Kent Sepkowitz—you’d be paying a lot more.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10uyYkH&via=Digg&text=How Over-the-Counter Birth Control Could Screw You

div.div: Younger Americans will have to take our word for it: there was a time, way back when Ronald Reagan was president, when your countrymen ordered coffee by simply asking for “coffee.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tc1Ms9&via=Digg&text=Starbucks Is Done With 'Coffee'

div.div: iTunes has walked a long road to reach this point—version 1.0 appeared in January 2001. While we're waiting for Apple's new ship date of "late November" to arrive, let's take a look back at how iTunes has evolved in the last 12 years.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UWMrvw&via=Digg&text=iTunes Through The Ages

div.a: 9 Months Of Pregnancy In A 4-Minute Stop-Motion Story

div.div: When his wife Osher became pregnant with their first child, photographer Tomer Grencel had the idea of documenting the pregnancy through a stop-motion video.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TkBAPI&via=Digg&text=9 Months Of Pregnancy In A 4-Minute Stop-Motion Story

div.div: Resurrection men were body snatchers who often worked in gangs to steal corpses from mortuaries and to dig up recently buried corpses to supply anatomy schools with bodies to dissect and study.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YcIb1l&via=Digg&text=Doctors, Dissection And Resurrection Men

div.a: Google, Apple Pakistani Domains Reportedly Hijacked

div.div: More than 280 popular ".pk" domain names, including that of the Pakistani Google homepage, have reportedly been hijacked by a Turkish hacking crew known as "eboz."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TmCHgU&via=Digg&text=Google, Apple Pakistani Domains Reportedly Hijacked

div.div: Because Letterpress is lacking gradients, drop shadows, and other embellishments, the Google Product Manager in me decided to take it apart and analyze what makes it a great experience.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R8oGoD&via=Digg&text=Letterpress Deconstructed

div.a: Learning Curve: No Longer Just A Human Trait

div.div: Using an artificial intelligence technique inspired by theories about how the brain recognizes patterns, technology companies are reporting startling gains in fields as diverse as computer vision, speech recognition and the identification of promising new molecules for designing drugs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TlXjpm&via=Digg&text=Learning Curve: No Longer Just A Human Trait

div.a: The Saddest And Most Expensive 26 Seconds Of Amateur Film Ever Made

div.div: Without the 486 frames of Kodachrome II 8mm safety film, our understanding of JFK’s assassination would likely be an even greater carnival of conspiracy theories than it already is. Well, maybe.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SiBRA4&via=Digg&text=The Saddest And Most Expensive 26 Seconds Of Amateur Film Ever Made

div.a: Megaupload Shutdown Actually Hurt Box Office Revenues

div.div: A new paper suggests that box office revenues were negatively impacted after the shutdown of Megaupload. The dip in revenues was most visible for average size and smaller films.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S2aOcI&via=Digg&text=Megaupload Shutdown Actually Hurt Box Office Revenues

div.a: Why Games With Female Protagonists Don’t Sell

div.div: So, here’s a question: why are female video game protagonists so rare?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UiZvPl&via=Digg&text=Why Games With Female Protagonists Don’t Sell

div.div: In recent years, the 131-year-old charity has been heavily criticized for its responses to 9/11, Katrina, the earthquake in Haiti, and the tsunami that hit Japan, with many of the complaints revolving around mismanaged funds and misleading fundraising, as well as the propriety of its blood-bank operations.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YcCS1O&via=Digg&text=Red Cross Backlash Builds

div.a: 'Pump Train' Pixelates The Subway Flooding Of Hurricane Sandy

div.div: Pump Train, a browser-based arcade-style game, charges players with a task taken on by real-life New York MTA workers following Hurricane Sandy: pumping water out of overflowing subway stations.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tleqrp&via=Digg&text='Pump Train' Pixelates The Subway Flooding Of Hurricane Sandy

div.a: Striking Side-By-Side Portraits Of Teens And Transgender Women

div.div: As part of a multi-year project called “The Girl Studies,” Charlie White photographed teen girls between the ages of 12 and 14 side-by-side with male to female transgender adults.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UVr9ym&via=Digg&text=Striking Side-By-Side Portraits Of Teens And Transgender Women

div.div: What to do about the dangerous button that costs companies money and employees their jobs?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UXbrZa&via=Digg&text=Eradicating 'Reply All'

div.a: What Happens When You Pair Classic Cars With Their Namesakes?

div.div: Ever wondered what it would look like if Abe Lincoln stood by a Lincoln, or if Queen Victoria ever met a Ford Crown Vic? Two guys decided to find out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WHeoNS&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Pair Classic Cars With Their Namesakes?
